channel.title: Stalls
channel.description:
There are stalls at the home of my server but i cant find the right cordinates to delete them can someone help
add me on msn please - Derp_herpherp@live.com

item.title: Stalls
item.dc:creator: @funyou funyou
item.description:
@funyou wrote:

Stalls arenâ€™t client sided. They are server sided, to delete them go to Client.Java in the server file and search for makeGlobalObject(HomeXcord, HomeYcord, (StallID), (Direction), 10);
Replace HomeXcord with the X Coordinate the stall is on.
Replace HomeYcord with the Y Coordinate the stall is on

Once you find the correct line with the correct coordinates, delete it. For example, this is a silk stall line of code:
makeGlobalObject(2889, 3542, 2560, -2, 10); // silk stall
If I deleted that from my client.java the stall will be gone.

Read full topic
